title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Prescriptive Learning Dashboard for Online Learning Outcome Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can interpret real-time feedback from a prescriptive learning dashboard to revise their weekly learning plans.
Learners can classify their learning patterns into three types based on interactive data (login frequency, content viewing time, etc.) from the dashboard.
Learners can achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate in mid-term assessments by utilizing personalized learning resources (videos/quizzes) recommended by the system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
